actorId.cachedResultName: Linkedin Posts Search Scraper | No Cookies (apimaestro/linkedin-posts-search-scraper-no-cookies)

parameters.customBody:
={
    "debugMode": false,
    "ignoreStartUrls": false,
    "includeNSFW": true,
    "maxItems": {{ $json['How many items to scrape'] }},
    "proxy": {
        "useApifyProxy": true,
        "apifyProxyGroups": [
            "RESIDENTIAL"
        ]
    },
    "scrollTimeout": 40,
    "searchComments": false,
    "searchCommunities": false,
    "searchPosts": true,
    "searchUsers": false,
    "searches": [
        "{{ $json['Search for...'] }}"
    ],
    "skipComments": false,
    "skipCommunity": false,
    "skipUserPosts": false,
    "sort": "relevance"
}
